gameDetails.name: Rum & Bones: Second Tide â€“ KS exclusives
gameDetails.description:
This is a set of playable characters that was included exclusively for backers of the Rum & Bones: Second Tide Kickstarter. Each character comes with a miniature, a hero board, and a set of skill cards for use in the game.

The set consists of three boxes and contains the characters listed below.

Captains Promos Set:

         Davy Jones (Captain)
         Ironclaw (Captain)
         Aurelio Voltaire (Captain)
         Terrible Tink (Brute)
    


Mercenaries Promos Set #3:

         Captain Hells (Captain)
         Viktor (Gunner)
         Eric the Beastly (Brute)
         Belle Rose (Quartermaster)
         Sebastian Lovell (Swashbuckler)
    


Mercenaries Promos Set #4:

         The Man in Charge (Captain)
         Maelstrom (Gunner)
         Coulter Mcswain (Brute)
         Papa Morte (Quartermaster)
         El Gancho (Swashbuckler)
